user_query: how their struggles will draw sympathy from an audience within the movie rather than director Lee Byung-hun earning an actual audience's sympathy through a more earnest approach and this becomes pretty common with how the movie is directed in general but I also feel like because of this we don't really get to spend much time with these homeless men on a personal level apart from being fed the occasional glimpse into their backstory it just feels quite forcefully done in a way that expects you to feel for them without really earning it while taking a concept like this and devaluing it under this guise of sincerity by spending most of the time with the wrong characters and I think it's quite ironic that a movie that aims to tell a heartfelt and uplifting story kind of disregards the actual heart of the movie in favour of two actors with the bigger star power now don't get me wrong I've generally enjoyed what I've seen of Park Seo-joon and IU in other movies... and they were one of the main reasons for why I wanted to watch this one but I found their characters here to be very unlikable and I was incredibly disappointed that Lee Byung-hun had the opportunity to tell a compelling and meaningful story about a group of underprivileged people and chose to focus on two characters who have no genuine interest in the subject matter I also can't help but feel like it's such a bizarre creative choice to have the lead characters be two people who are trying to keep their jobs almost at

entities.entity_description: 이병헌은 이 영화의 감독으로, 노숙자들의 이야기를 진정성 있게 다루기보다는 스타 파워가 있는 배우들에게 집중하는 연출 방식을 선택했다는 평가를 받았다
박서준은 이 영화의 주연 배우 중 한 명으로, 리뷰어가 다른 영화에서의 연기를 즐겨봤다고 언급했다
아이유는 이 영화의 주연 배우 중 한 명으로, 리뷰어가 이 영화를 보고 싶었던 주요 이유 중 하나였다

relationships.relationship_description: 이병헌 감독은 노숙자들의 이야기보다 스타 파워가 있는 박서준에게 더 집중하는 연출을 했다
이병헌 감독은 노숙자들의 이야기보다 스타 파워가 있는 아이유에게 더 집중하는 연출을 했다
박서준과 아이유는 이 영화에서 함께 주연을 맡았으며, 두 캐릭터 모두 주제에 진정한 관심이 없는 인물로 묘사되었다
